agenda_items.title:
AGENDA 
SPECIAL CALLED CITY COUNCIL MEETING
MONDAY, DECEMBER 16, 2024
ORDER OF BUSINESS

The Special Called City Council meeting will be held by videoconference and in the Council Chambers, 6th Floor at City Hall.    Individuals who wish to speak in accordance with the City Council Rules of Procedure must sign up with the City Secretaryâ€™s Office.  

The public may attend the meeting virtually; however, City Hall is available for those wishing to attend the meeting in person. 

The following videoconference link is available to the public to listen to the meeting and Office of Communications & Customer Experience/311 will also stream the City Council meeting on Spectrum Cable Channel 16 and bit.ly/cityofdallastv: 
https://dallascityhall.webex.com/dallascityhall/j.php?MTID=me9dbfa7df5f7a03dd59653002c12f056

Personnel (Sec. 551.074 T.O.M.A.)

Interview Baker Tilly semifinalist candidates and discuss qualifications of the candidates and deliberate the appointment of the City Manager.

Consideration of (1) qualifications and appointment of to the position of city manager; (2) adopting a resolution appointing as City Manager; (3) approving the terms of the Agreement of Appointment; and (4) authorizing the execution of the Agreement of Appointment of the city manager- Financing: Salary information is included in the Agreement of Appointment
